meanings.definition: A violent shock as from a heavy blow.
meanings.sent1: She suffered multiple concussions after falling off her bike.
meanings.sent2: Football players are at risk of concussions due to the physical nature of the sport.
meanings.sent3: The idea of a squirrel getting concussions from falling off a tree is quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The loud thunderclap was like a concussion to my ears.
meanings.sent5: The image of the crashing waves against the rocks created a visual concussion in my mind.

meanings.definition: Injury to the brain resulting from an impact on the head.
meanings.sent1: He was hospitalized due to severe concussions from the car accident.
meanings.sent2: Boxers take precautions to avoid concussions during matches.
meanings.sent3: The idea of a robot suffering concussions from bumping into walls is funny.
meanings.sent4: The news of the scandal caused a concussion in the political world.
meanings.sent5: The explosion created a shockwave that felt like a concussion in the air.
